thread.title: Matt Damon cheers on his daughter's soccer game | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Matt Damon cheers on his daughter's soccer game | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Matt Damon cheers on his daughter's soccer game | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share He kept warm, sporting black boots, dark pants and a light zip-up hoodie during the match. A simple wedding band and several bracelets could be spotted on the star's hands from afar. Dressing down: The star looked practical, wearing a knit cap and a dark hoodie to the pitch Warm embrace: After the game, Matt gave his stepdaughter Alexia a big hug After the game the avid humanitarian stepped onto the field to greet daughter Alexia Barroso, who is actually his wife Luciana Barroso's child from her first marriage. The Good Will Hunting actor congratulated the 17-year-old with a big hug as the two chatted. After giving his daughter some post-game congratulations, the Academy Award winner walked away with his eldest offspring and their friends. Proud papa: Matt seemed to enjoy the game, seen smiling throughout his time at the field Nice match: The Academy Awards winner walked away with his daughter and friends after the game In addition to teenage daughter Alexia, Matt and his wife of over a decade have three other kids together: Isabella, 10, Gia, eight, and Stella, six. The pair met in 2003 were wed in a private civil ceremony in December 2005 in New York. Damon considers himself fortunate to have led a mostly private life with his family, explaining in a 2015 USA Today interview that he likes to fly under the radar. 'I attribute a lot of it to luck. [Paparazzi members] shoot me every day coming out of the gym... [but a] married guy with kids? It's not that exciting.' Share or comment on this article 114
